title: Jeune homme pour 60+F/young man
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


J'ai 24 ans et je veux prends soin (sexuellement) d'une femme âgée 40ans plus. Je veux être là pour ceux qui ont besoin de contact physique.

I'm 24 and want to sexually take care of a woman older than 40. I want to be there for someone who is missing that physical touch in their life. If you think you're too old...what do you have to lose? Nothing. Reach out and I promise you won't be disappointed
